title: Slovenia Average Monthly Gross Wages in Manufacturing
description: Wages in Manufacturing in Slovenia increased to 2022 EUR/Month in August from 1959 EUR/Month in July of 2022. Wages in Manufacturing in Slovenia averaged 1443.74 EUR/Month from 2005 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2127 EUR/Month in November of 2021 and a record low of 920 EUR/Month in February of 2005. This page provides - Slovenia Average Monthly Gross Wages in Manufacturing - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Statistical Office of the Republic of Slovenia
